mapper.delete: delete from psy_consult_serve where serve_id is not null;
mapper.select: select re.relation_id as relationId, cf.id as id, cf.price as price, cf.name as name, cf.num as num, cf.level as level, cf.service_object as serviceObject, con.id as consultantId, con.nick_name as consultantName from psy_consult_serve re left join psy_consult_server_config cf on re.serve_id = cf.id left join psy_consult con on re.consult_id = con.id where re.relation_id = #{id}
